Master director Chang Cheh takes us on a wild and colorful journey through a magical martial world universe based on Louis Cha's classic novel, Legend of the Condor Heroes.
 Alexander Fu Sheng stars as a young man trained by the Weird Seven who elopes with the daughter of Eastern Evil and acquires awesome new powers from a pair of eccentric teachers.
